name: American Civil War: From Sumter to Appomattox
name_original: American Civil War: From Sumter to Appomattox
description:
American Civil War: From Sumter to Appomattox is a strategy game developed by Adanac Command Systems. It came out on 23-07-1996. Interactive Magic published the game.
American Civil War: From Sumter to Appomattox is available on PC.
